eu.jpereira.trainings.designpatterns.behavioral.command.model
Interface DBServerInstance

public interface DBServerInstance

This class models a Database Server instance running on a network node. A given instante is identified by the IP Address of the node where the instance is running

Author:
jpereira

Method Summary
 DBServerInstanceProperties getConnectionDetails()
          Get the properties associated to the current instance
 DBServerInstanceStatus getInstanceStatus()
          Get the current instance status
 java.lang.String getIpAddress()
          Return the IP Address of the node where the instance is running.
 void startInstance()
          Starts the instance.
 void stopInstance()
          Attempts to stop an instance
 

Method Detail

getIpAddress

java.lang.String getIpAddress()
Return the IP Address of the node where the instance is running. The IP Address value should be unique in the context of a DBServerInstanceGroup DB

Returns:
The IP Address

getConnectionDetails

DBServerInstanceProperties getConnectionDetails()
Get the properties associated to the current instance

Returns:
an instance of DBServerInstanceProperties or null if none associated

startInstance

void startInstance()
                   throws CouldNotConnectException
Starts the instance.

Throws:
CouldNotConnectException - if some error occurs while connecting to the instance

stopInstance

void stopInstance()
                  throws CouldNotConnectException
Attempts to stop an instance

Throws:
CouldNotConnectException - if some exception in the normal flow occurs

getInstanceStatus

DBServerInstanceStatus getInstanceStatus()
                                         throws CouldNotConnectException
Get the current instance status

Returns:
Throws:
CouldNotConnectException - instance status
See Also:
DBServerInstanceStatus
